mapper.select: SELECT RR_NO, RV_NO, RR_GROUPSEQ, RR_TAB ,MB_ID , RR_CONTENT ,RR_DATE FROM REVIEW_REPLY WHERE RV_NO = #{rv_no} ORDER BY RR_GROUPSEQ , RR_NO
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM REVIEW_REPLY WHERE RR_NO= #{rr_no} AND (SELECT MB_ID FROM REVIEW_REPLY WHERE RR_NO = #{rr_no}) = #{mb_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW_REPLY SET RR_GROUPSEQ = RR_GROUPSEQ + 1 WHERE RV_NO = (SELECT RV_NO FROM REVIEW_REPLY WHERE RR_NO= #{rr_no}) AND RR_GROUPSEQ > (SELECT RR_GROUPSEQ FROM REVIEW_REPLY WHERE RR_NO = #{rr_no})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW_REPLY VALUES (REPLYSEQ.NEXTVAL, (SELECT RV_NO FROM REVIEW_REPLY WHERE RR_NO = #{rr_no}), (SELECT RR_GROUPSEQ+1 FROM REVIEW_REPLY WHERE RR_NO = #{rr_no}), (SELECT RR_TAB+1 FROM REVIEW_REPLY WHERE RR_NO=#{rr_no}), #{mb_id},#{rr_content},SYSDATE)
